name: Seismic Shake-Up
description:
(For LÖVE V10.2) Using .exe is recommended as collisions can break with .love!

Seismic Shake-Up is a Time Travel based platformer where you travel between a city before and after an earthquake, where some can only be passed in one timeline.

This game was made for the LÖVE Game Jam 2022. It was made in just 7 Days, this was including 5 days i worked during the day. I'm proud of what i accomplished but still wish i had planed further ahead.

Controls:

  • A  and D to move left and right.
  • Space to jump.
  • S to duck.
  • E to pickup boxes.
  • R to time travel (Only works if unlocked)

Credits:

  • Simple Tiled Implementationlib  by karai17: https://github.com/karai17/Simple-Tiled-Implementation
  • JSON ecoder and decoder lib by Jeffrey Friedl: http://regex.info/blog/lua/json
  • Class lib by Bart Bes.

Unless marked, all other code, sounds and graphics are by me.
